MaxWalkSpeed.Description: Base max walk speed of the Ghost

MaxWalkSpeedCrouched.Description: Base max walk speed when crouched

TerrorRadius.Description: Base terror radius, in centimeters, of the Ghost

BaseStalkMinRange.Description: Range from stalked player at which the stalker gain points according to the minimum range rate (From [0 to X])

BaseStalkMaxRange.Description: Range from stalked player at which the stalker gain points according to the maximum range rate (From [X to infinity])

SurvivorStalkPointsDepleteDelay.Description: Delay before stalk points starts depleting

PowerSecondsToCharge.Description: Maximum seconds to charge the power

SlasherPassiveStalkSpeedFactor.Description: Speed multiplier applied when in stalk  mode

SlasherActiveStalkSpeedFactor.Description: Speed multiplier applied when stalking a player

SlasherPassiveStalkCrouchedSpeedFactor.Description: Speed multiplier applied when in stalk  mode while Crouch

SlasherActiveStalkCrouchedSpeedFactor.Description: Speed multiplier applied when stalking a player while Crouch

GhostStealthTerrorRadius.Description: Terror Radius Size (cm) while in Stealth

SlasherTerrorRadiusIncreaseRate.Description: Rate (cm/s) at which the radius fade for a increasing modification to the terror radius

SlasherTerrorRadiusDecreaseRate.Description: Rate (cm/s) at which the radius fade for a increasing modification to the terror radius

BaseSightRevealTime.Description: Seconds a player needs to see the killer before he is revealed

BaseSightRevealRate.Description: Number of charges a revealer gains each second they are revealing

BaseSightRevealRegressionRate.Description: Number of charges a revealer loses each second they are not revealing, until they hit 0

KillerSight_ScreenVisibilityZoneRadiusPe.Description: Horizontal ratio of the screen to be designated as the visibility zone (outwards from center)
Vertical ratio of the screen to be designated as the visibility zone (outwards from center)

KillerSight_MinimumCharacterScreenPercen.Description: Minimum percent of the screen occupied by the character to begin being considered seen while their centerpoint is in sight zone
Minimum percent of the screen that needs to be occupied by the character to begin being seen if they are outside of the Visibility Zone

KillerSight_MinimumCharacterVisiblePixel.Description: Minimum percent of the pixels on the character's body that needs to be visible to begin being considered as seen

KillerSight_MinimumCharacterScreenPercen.Description: Minimum percent of the screen occupied by the character to continue to be considered seen while their centerpoint is in sight zone
Minimum percent of the screen that needs to be occupied by the character to continue to be seen if they are outside of the Visibility Zone

KillerSight_MinimumCharacterVisiblePixel.Description: Minimum percent of the pixels on the character's body that needs to be visible to continue to be considered as seen

Addon_DriversLicense_ProgressLossPercent.Description: Percent of porgress lost when a generator explodes due to Drivers License Addon

Addon_DriversLicense_BlockedTime.Description: Time in seconds that a generator will be blocked for when DrivesLicense addon is triggered
